mapper.select: select P.*, O.*, PF.* from product P left join options O on P.productNum = O.productNum left join productFiles PF on P.productNum = PF.productNum where P.productNum=#{productNum}
mapper.insert: insert into product (productNum, name, category, subtitle, includes, contents, details, cartInfo, grinds) values (#{productNum}, #{name}, #{category}, #{subtitle} , #{includes}, #{contents}, #{details}, #{cartInfo}, #{grinds})
mapper.update: update product set name=#{name}, category=#{category}, subtitle=#{subtitle}, includes=#{includes}, contents=#{contents}, details=#{details}, cartInfo=#{cartInfo}, grinds=#{grinds} where productNum=#{productNum}
mapper.insert: insert into productFiles (fileNum, productNum, fileName, originName) values (productFiles_seq.nextval, #{productNum}, #{fileName}, #{originName})
mapper.select: select * from options where productNum=#{productNum} order by optionNum asc
mapper.insert: insert into options (optionNum, productNum, type, optionInfo, price, discountRate, stock) values (options_seq.nextval, #{productNum}, #{type}, #{optionInfo}, #{price}, #{discountRate}, #{stock})
mapper.update: update options set type=#{type}, optionInfo=#{optionInfo}, price=#{price}, discountRate=#{discountRate}, stock=#{stock} where optionNum=#{optionNum}
